cause.description:
Mission Life Center is a non-profit organization that offers you an opportunity to give hope, encourage lives, build lives, and save a life! This is the essence of why you were created and this is the goal of why this organization was created. Our purpose is to empower people to help people. There are so many of us that feel like something is missing in our life. That something is the need to help the hurting people in this world. We are here for a short period of time in this world and it is time to make the most of it and save someone’s life.
1. one person can make a difference
cause.mission: Go with Passion and Expect to Save Lives
cause.name: Mission Life center
